description: The Pendulum Julian Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum 'Pendulum Julian') is a beautiful and easy to care for maple tree. It has cascading branches which produce beautiful downwardly arching peach leaves in the spring, turning to beautiful deep green foliage in the summer and bright red leaves in the fall. Its slow growth rate makes it an ideal choice for small gardens and it is also frost-resistant. Whether youâ€™re looking for a small tree for your patio or a larger tree for your garden, this maple tree is ideal. It offers all-season interest, with understated beauty and an easy maintenance schedule.
